posts.name: Piccini Wood Fired Brick Oven Pizza
posts.note: Homey, cash-only eatery serving a wide-ranging menu of Italian staples, from pastas to sandwiches. Make sure to get a side of meatballs if nothing else.

posts.name: Smitty's Clam Bar
posts.note: Snug veteran clam shack preparing no-frills seafood dishes with a surfer vibe.
